author: Akash Patel
comment: After reinstall always show error: error in sync check your connection I am on high speed wi-fi
title: Unable to restore a/c

author: Lucie J.
comment: I now always suggest this app for shared expenses. The app is easy to use, flexible and helps to manage money when in a group. The customer service is really good too. I couldn't retrieve my account, wrote cospender a message on fb and within a day I had an answer with the steps to follow. Congratulations !
title: Excellent app and amazing service

author: Filippo Maccari
comment: Great app, but it lack of the ability to have a different date of the entries rather than the current day :-(

author: Oliver Sharpe
comment: Used during a trip in Thailand with a friend who used the iOS version, worked perfectly!

author: Emanuela Silvestri
comment: Really missing the chance to set a different date for the entries

author: balkrishna marothiya
comment: The app has all you need. You just need to explore it. This is a second app which I am rating 5* so just go for it if you need not to calculate your bills, dues and monthly spends.
title: Best app for a group spends calculations
